spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 92,557 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,290, up to 11,451.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.6 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Use: Unleash your inner tempest to gain 8,794 Strength for 15 sec. Your next 3 abilities cause a lightning blast dealing 318,276 Nature damage to your primary target. Damage increased by 100% with each subsequent blast. (2 Min Cooldown)
